ygData.subject: Rubies- Where to Find & QUEST
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail all. I have been a lurker for a while & I have a question. First, I would like to get my hands on some rubies. Don t want to pay the 159pp that they sell
ygData.messageBody:
Hail all. I have been a lurker for a while & I have a question. First, I would like to get my hands on some rubies. Don't want to pay the 159pp that they sell for in High Keep. (I'm still a poor Wizard.) I have heard that you can get one from the High Shaman in Splitpaw lair. Is this true? Next, on The EQlizer, I have read about a quest. It is involving Lyunga in Innothule swamp. (Only open to dark races) When you hail her she says something about needing a Ruby. When you give one to her you get 1 of three things. 1) Midnight mallot, 2) Bruthchopper, 3rd) A +6 int, +6 wis earing, with some charges of a necro spell on it!!!!! What a prize!! Has anyone tried this and gotten any? Any other place to get rubies? As for me I thing I will be camping Splitpaw. Since I'm kinda high for it I'll see if I can make a deal with the campers. =) May Innorruk Guide Me!!

Kilrathos Dragonslayer
25th Dark Elf Wizard
Xegony Server
